C++ Code

Some information to handle the cpp files in the telemetry.

Information
#pragma region

Like you can see in the file <scs_config_handlers.cpp> the visual studio keyword

#pragma region RegionName
 ...
#pragma endregion Comment

is used. With the help of this lines, you can outline the region with a click on the `-`.  In other IDE's or editors it may not give you that possibility, but it still should help to understand the region.
